Industry Projects

Montana Tags

Across the entire US, MontanaTags.com eliminates sales tax and personal property tax on your vehicle or Vessel with our online registration service. Experience Montana's freedoms, bringing 100% tax savings to you!

  • About the project

  • Go To montanatags.com

Sunnybrook Software Company

Sunnybrook is a modern TMS software. It's a cloud-based software that is designed to help 3PL providers and brokers get shipments through the entire lifecycle. It handles Shipments, Customers, Carriers, Factors, Locations, and Accounting as well as integrating with Quickbooks, Marcopoint and more.

  • About the project

  • Go To sunnybrooksoftware.com

Be Pro Be Proud

The best time to get started on your better future is right now. There are thousands of opportunities right here in Arkansas for skilled professionals. And this is where you’ll find them. If you’ve got the talent and the ambition, Arkansas's top employers are looking for you. And, in many cases, you can even learn while you earn. Connecting with your profitable career has never been easier.

  • About the project

  • Go To beprobeproud.org

Arkansas Valley Electric Cooperative

Arkansas Valley Electric Cooperative pledges to offer safe, reliable, affordable energy to our member-owners consistent with sound business principles within the electric industry.

  • About the project

Union Corrugating

For over three-quarters of a century, Union Corrugating Company has served the metal building components market. The company was launched in 1946 when Mr. J. E. Union left West Virginia with his manually operated corrugating machine and settled in Fayetteville, NC. By the early 1950s, J.E. had built a small business that was struggling to survive.

  • About the project

  • Go To unioncorrugating.com

Reed's Metals

Reed’s Metals, headquartered in Brookhaven, MS is one of the largest providers of metal roofing systems, metal roofing panels, pole barns, and pre-engineered steel buildings in the South. Reed's is comprised of 10 locations including 8 manufacturing sites and 2 storefront locations. We have 3 IAS plants which include Brookhaven, MS - Florence, AL and Horseshoe Beach, FL (October 2021). We utilize state-of-the-art technology and fabrication methods to provide unprecedented quality and service - offering same-day availability on standard roofing orders and in-stock supplies, on-site roll-forming for standard seam projects, and job-site delivery within 72 hours on most projects.

  • About the project

  • Go To reedsmetals.com

Arkansas House of Representatives

The Arkansas House of Representatives is the lower house of the Arkansas General Assembly, the state legislature of the US state of Arkansas. The House is composed of 100 members elected from an equal amount of constituencies across the state.

  • About the project

  • Go To arkansashouse.org

Hank's Fine Furniture

Founded in 1975 by Hank Browne, Hank's Fine Furniture has grown to 18 stores in 4 states and is one of America's Top 100 Independent Furniture Retailers. From the very beginning, Hank's Fine Furniture's success has been built on offering quality furniture, bedding and accessories at excellent values. As a family-owned business, Hank's Fine Furniture has thrived because of our dedication to service after the sale. You, the customer, have been the most important part of our business for over 40 years.

  • About the project

  • Go To hanksfurniture.com

Kajacs Contractors

Founded in 1993, KAJACS Contractors has built a solid reputation of excellence. Our above-and-beyond approach to coordinating and executing projects of all sizes sets us apart as a competitive builder with a superior process. KAJACS combines seasoned professionals with state-of-the-art equipment to successfully complete our many industrial and public works projects. While many of our projects are challenging, we are well-known in Missouri, Tennessee, Mississippi, and Arkansas for being reliable and for providing quality work. At KAJACS, everyone works together to achieve our primary objective: high-quality, professional work at the lowest possible cost!

  • About the project

  • Go To kajacs.com

Arkansas Bride

Since 1990, Arkansas Bride has been the No. 1 resource for Natural State brides planning their big day. It's not only the biggest bridal magazine in the state, but it is also the best online tool for soon-to-be newlyweds in search of vendors and inspiration.

  • About the project

  • Go To arkansasbride.com

Low's Bridal

Low's Bridal began with six dresses in a room above the family pharmacy. 42 years later, Low's Bridal retains the personal boutique experience, while offering a selection of more than 2,500 wedding dresses.

  • About the project

  • Go To lowsbridal.com

Allen Gate & Panel

Allen Gate & Panel, Inc. is a family-owned and operated business whose doors have been open for over 25 years. Starting as a personal project by Bill and Dick Allen in 1980, we have now grown to employ over 40 people in the small town of Prattsville, Arkansas where our products are manufactured. We strive to handle our customers with dignity and respect. No question or job is too small. Our business was built on taking care of individuals' needs and that is what we continue to cater to today. We handle a wide variety of cattle working equipment, from panels and gates to feeders and sweep systems.

  • About the project

  • Go To allengateandpanel.com/
